title: Update Contact Us details and add iPhone watermark across site

requirements.text:
Update all “Contact Us” details displayed on the site to use exactly the following information (in English):
- Address: "Lane 5, SISTER TELESYSTEM, Bapuji Nagar, Near Bank of Maharashtra"
- Phone: "+91 9937070901"
- Email: "sister.telesystem@gmail.com"
This must be reflected anywhere contact details are shown, including (at minimum) the Contact page contact info cards, the Contact page map placeholder address text, and the site footer contact section.

quotes:
change the contact us to  address lane 5 sister telesystem bapuji nagar near bank of maharastra  phone number 
 +91 9937070901 email id - sister.telesystem@gmail.com

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact page contact information cards show the updated address, phone number, and email exactly as specified.
The Contact page map placeholder address text shows the updated address exactly as specified.
The footer Contact Us section shows the updated address, phone number, and email exactly as specified.
No old placeholder contact details (e.g., "123 Mobile Street", "(555) 123-4567", "info@sistertelesystem.com") remain visible anywhere in the UI.

requirements.text: Add a subtle iPhone watermark graphic across the website pages (site-wide), implemented as a static image overlay or background layer that does not block interactions (e.g., does not intercept clicks/scroll) and maintains readability of page content.

quotes: and add a water mark of iphone in the web page

acceptanceCriteria: An iPhone watermark is visible on all pages (Home, Products, Services, About, Contact).
The watermark is subtle (low opacity) and does not reduce text readability.
The watermark does not block any interactions (links, buttons, form inputs remain usable).
The watermark uses a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated (not served from the backend).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or any files under frontend/src/components/ui.
Place any new generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the frontend; do not serve images from the backend.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not change the inquiry form fields or submission behavior.
Do not add third-party maps, geolocation, or external embeds; only update the existing map placeholder text.
Do not redesign site navigation or page structure beyond what is needed to add the watermark and update contact details.
